alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:11AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Pushmataha and central Latimer Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1110 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Wilburton to 5 miles northeast of Yanush to 6 miles southwest of Nashoba to 4 miles west of Cloudy to 5 miles southeast of Antlers. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Clayton... Red Oak... Rattan... Albion... Clayton Lake State Park... Damon... Bengal... Tuskahoma... Yanush... Robbers Cave State Park... Nashoba... Kiamichi... Oleta... Cloudy... Corinne... Sobol... Panola... Dela... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
